Key Arguments: The legislation threatens freedom of speech and promotes a single narrative aligned with the government, media, and pharmaceutical companies.
The government and media are mostly exempt from the legislation, indicating a bias and lack of accountability.
During the COVID-19 pandemic, the government and media spread misinformation about the virus, masks, lockdowns, and vaccines.
The proposed laws are seen as hypocritical, as the government and media have been major sources of misinformation.
Notable Quotes: This legislation sounds very much like a tyrannical, dictatorial set of rules and regulations that will destroy the very concept of freedom of speech that Australian democracy is based upon.
Nobody has caused more harm to the Australian people in the last 3 years than the Australian government and the mainstream media.
